One [[cpp/language/class template argument deduction|deduction guide]] is provided for {{lc|std::experimental::unique_resource}} to permit deduction from given resource handle and deleter.

The arguments (after [[cpp/language/implicit conversion#Array to pointer conversion|array-to-pointer]] and [[cpp/language/implicit conversion#Function to pointer|function-to-pointer]] decay, if any) are copied or moved into the constructed {{tt|unique_resource}}.
